    • Battleline [1,995pts]

      • Krosvagg the Spiteful - Gatebreaker Mega-Gargant [525pts]

        Selections: Almighty Stomp, Death Grip, Fortcrusha Flail, Hurled Boulder

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, HERO, Leader, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT, GATEBREAKER, Battleline

        Gatebreaker Wound Track: Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Gatebreaker Mega-Gargant, Unit Abilities: Almighty Stomp, Crushing Charge, Death Grip, Longshanks, Smash Down, Son of Behemat, Terror, Timberrrrr!, Weapon: Almighty Stomp, Death Grip, Fortcrusha Flail, Hurled Boulder


        Gatebreaker Wound Track Wounds SufferedMoveFortcrusha FlailHurled Boulder Ref
        Wounds1 0-1212"1018"
        Wounds2 13-1811"915"
        Wounds3 19-2410"712"
        Wounds4 25-309"69"
        Wounds5 31+8"56"
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gatebreaker Mega-Gargant *3574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Almighty Stomp You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Almighty Stomp attacks unless the target is a MONSTER.
        Crushing Charge After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds if it is a MONSTER, or D6 mortal wounds if it is not a MONSTER.
        Death Grip You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Death Grip attacks that target a MONSTER.
        Longshanks When this model makes a move, it can ignore models, endless spells, invocations and terrain features that are less than 4" tall at their highest point.
        Smash Down Add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made by this unit that targets a unit that is part of a garrison or is wholly on or within a terrain feature. In addition, add 1 to the roll when you carry out a Smash To Rubble monstrous rampage with this unit.
        Son of Behemat If a spell or ability would slay this model without any wounds or mortal wounds being inflicted by the spell or ability, this model suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units if they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Timberrrrr! If this model is slain, before removing the model from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 5" from this model. Each unit within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a MEGA-GARGANT. This model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Almighty Stomp Melee2"23+3+-2D3
        Death Grip Melee3"13+2+-3D6
        Fortcrusha Flail Melee3"*4+3+-33
        Hurled Boulder Missile*13+2+-34

      • Ravaging Skarvabat - Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant [490pts]

        Selections: 5. Glowy Lantern, 5. Very Acquisitive, Almighty Stomp, Amulet of Destiny, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Death Grip, General, Hurled Debris, Shipwrecka Warclub

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, HERO, KRAKEN-EATER, Leader, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT, Battleline, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Glowy Lantern, Command Trait: Very Acquisitive, Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Unit: Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant, Unit Abilities: Almighty Stomp, Crushing Charge, Death Grip, Get Orf Me Land!, Longshanks, Son of Behemat, Stuff 'Em In Me Net, Terror, Timberrrrr!, Weapon: Almighty Stomp, Death Grip, Hurled Debris, Shipwrecka Warclub


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Glowy Lantern The bearer is a WIZARD. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Very Acquisitive You can take 1 extra Trophies Taken By Force artefact of power for this general’s army. In addition, this general can have up to 2 artefacts of power instead of 1.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveShipwrecka WarclubHurled Debris
        Wounds1 0-1211"824"
        Wounds2 13-1810"721"
        Wounds3 19-249"718"
        Wounds4 25-308"615"
        Wounds5 31+7"512"
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant *3574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Almighty Stomp You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Almighty Stomp attacks unless the target is a MONSTER.
        Crushing Charge After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds if it is a MONSTER, or D6 mortal wounds if it is not a MONSTER.
        Death Grip You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Death Grip attacks that target a MONSTER.
        Get Orf Me Land! In your hero phase, if you have any models with this ability within 1" of an objective that you control, you can pick one of those models and say that it will kick the objective away. If you do so, you can move that objective up to 2D6" to a new position on the battlefield, more than 1" away from any models, terrain features or other objectives. An objective cannot be kicked away more than once in the same phase.
        Longshanks When this model makes a move, it can ignore models, endless spells, invocations and terrain features that are less than 4" tall at their highest point.
        Son of Behemat If a spell or ability would slay this model without any wounds or mortal wounds being inflicted by the spell or ability, this model suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Stuff 'Em In Me Net After this model piles in, you can pick up to D3 enemy models within 3" of this model and roll a dice for each of them. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units if they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Timberrrrr! If this model is slain, before removing the model from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 5" from this model. Each unit within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a MEGA-GARGANT. This model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Almighty Stomp Melee2"23+3+-2D3
        Death Grip Melee3"13+2+-3D6
        Hurled Debris Missile*34+3+-1D3
        Shipwrecka Warclub Melee3"*3+3+-22

      • The Galleon Crashers - Mancrusher Gargants Mob [490pts]

        Selections: 'Eadbutt, 3 Mancrusher Gargant, Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Massive Club, Mighty Kick

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, HERO, KRAKEN-EATER, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT, Battleline

        Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Mancrusher Gargant, Unit Abilities: Keep Up!, Stomping Charge, Stuff 'Em In Me Bag, Timber!, Weapon: 'Eadbutt, Massive Club, Mighty Kick


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedStomping ChargeMassive Club'Eadbutt
        Wounds1 0-22+104
        Wounds2 3-43+93
        Wounds3 5-74+818"
        Wounds4 8-95+62
        Wounds5 10+6+51
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Mancrusher Gargant 8"1275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Keep Up! If this unit is within 12" of a friendly MEGA-GARGANT at the start of the charge phase, it can attempt to charge in that charge phase even if it ran in the same turn.
        Stomping Charge After a model from this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of it and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Stomping Charge value for the charging model shown on the damage table above, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If this unit has more than 1 model, do not allocate the mortal wounds until all of the models in this unit have made their charge moves.
        Stuff 'Em In Me Bag After a model from this unit piles in, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of it and roll a dice. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Timber! If a model from this unit is slain, before removing it from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 3" from that model. Each unit within 2" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a GARGANT. The model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        'Eadbutt Melee1"14+3+-3*
        Massive Club Melee3"*3+3+-11
        Mighty Kick Melee2"13+3+-2D3

If this unit has more than 1 model, do not allocate the mortal wounds until all of the models in this unit have made their charge moves.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Sons of Behemat

          Selections: Taker Tribe

          Battle Trait: Chuck Rocks, Get Rid of 'Em!, Mightier Makes Rightier, More Stuff for Me Collection, Weapon: Chuck Rocks


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Chuck Rocks In your shooting phase, you can pick 1 friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT unit wholly within 18" of your general. Each model in that unit can make a shooting attack with the Chuck Rocks missile weapon below:
        Get Rid of 'Em! When using the Mightier Makes Rightier rule to determining control of an objective (pg 57), each friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT model counts as 15 models instead of 10, and each friendly MEGAGARGANT counts as 30 models instead of 20.
        Mightier Makes Rightier When determining control of an objective, each friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT model counts as 10 models instead of 1, and each friendly MEGAGARGANT counts as 20 models instead of 1.
        More Stuff for Me Collection Each time an enemy model with an artefact of power is slain, you can roll for a triumph on the Triumph table. You can use that triumph during the current battle, even if you have already used it. If you do not use it during the current battle, it is lost (you cannot use it in your next battle).
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Chuck Rocks Missile18"D34+3+-1D3

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Beast Master

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Beast Master


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Beast Master When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any MONSTERS from your starting army on the battlefield.

    • Realm of Battle

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghur

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Command Abilities: Feral Roar, Special Rules: Predators and Prey, Seismic Shift, Spell: Metamorphosis


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Feral Roar You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The unit that receives the command must be a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that unit's damage table, it is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
        Special Rules Description Ref
        Predators and Prey Once per battle round, you score 1 additional victory point if any enemy MONSTERS were slain in that battle round.
        Seismic Shift At the start of the third battle round, after the players roll off to determine who has the first turn, the player taking the second turn in that battle round can pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield and remove it from play.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Metamorphosis 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly HERO that is not a MONSTER and that is within range and visible to the caster. That HERO gains the MONSTER keyword until your next hero phase.
